text: @realDonaldTrump Has anyone told you more than 100,000 people have died from the CoronaVirus? Didn't you say it's at 15 and going down to zero? And your Loot and Shoot policy didn't seem to go over very well tonight. I can't wait to hear your next dumb ass statement... Your on a roll keep it up!!
